content.question: The diploid number of chromosomes in the cell of a domesticated dog is <math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following options includes the correct number of chromosomes in a cell after each cellular process (<math alttext="G 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>G</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math> checkpoint, meiosis, and fertilization, respectively)?

choices.label: After <math alttext="G 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>G</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>CheckpointAfterMeiosisAfterFertilization<math alttext="156" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>156</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="39" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>39</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

After <math alttext="G 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>G</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>CheckpointAfterMeiosisAfterFertilization<math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="39" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>39</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

After <math alttext="G 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>G</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>CheckpointAfterMeiosisAfterFertilization<math alttext="156" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>156</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="39" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>39</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

After <math alttext="G 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>G</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>CheckpointAfterMeiosisAfterFertilization<math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="39" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>39</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: After <math alttext="G 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>G</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>CheckpointAfterMeiosisAfterFertilization<math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="39" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>39</mn></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="78" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>78</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 5.A: Perform mathematical calculations, including: i. mathematical equations in the curriculum ii. means iii. rates iv. ratios v. percentages and percent changes
